viz.txt: This process will give you a sum-up of the order you're about to process

order.no_aoi: Please select an AOI in step 1
order.txt: This tile get the availables orders coresponding to the vizualisation parameters. The process will retreive all the orders and update the order selector in the next tile. If everything is coorect then the download btn will be free.

download.no_order: please select an order name. If non is uvailable please run the Ordering process.
download.txt: This tile will download the orders selected on the step 1 AOI to your Sepal folder

password.label: API key
password.error_msg: You cannot expose the default API key

planet.invalid_key: The current key is invalid, please provide a valid Planet key
planet.test_key: We are currently checking your API key
planet.load_mosaics: We are retrieving the mosaics list
planet.mosaic_loaded: The list of mosaic is available in the Mosaic selector
